title: Losing Streak
body: Tips for getting out of a losing streak? On a 8 game losing streak so far and demoted back to Silver 5. Really sucks and I dont really want to lose anymorre lp :/

replies.body:
Try Duo Que in a normal just to get your spirits up. Just have fun in the normals and when your off tilt go into ranked again.

Thats how i get off tilt anyways
blame rito for broke lp gain/lose  (7/21, stupid gain 1/2 hat you lose sht) and the fact that you always get pared with the high people
